value:
A gaudy mask from Kris. Featuring
a butterfly design and velvety finish.
Have you checked the dress code?

key: MDAID_仮面舞踏会用の仮面・極
MDAID_H_仮面舞踏会用の仮面・極
value:
A gaudy mask from Kris. High quality
and detailed in decoration. Required
attire for attending a masquerade ball.

A wild hat Kris had. Made with wolf
skin, even its smell is wild.

A wild hat Kris had. Made with fine
wolf skin. It has its own ear coverings
attached and keeps its wearer warm.

A cool mask given by Julian. It was
designed to obscure the identity.
Said to be worn by the Soothsires.

A cool mask given by Julian. It was
designed to obscure the identity.
The red style is worn by leaders.

A beautiful hair decoration from Lena.
The dainty ornamentation includes
a red jewel.

A beautiful hair decoration from Lena.
The breathtaking ornamentation is
completed by a red jewel.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 9: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 9: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 9: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 9: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Book IV, Chapter 9: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. (Allies
deployed as cohorts using Pair Up do not
count.) All four allies must survive.

Hails from the Altean village of Sera. Leader
of the 7th Platoon, a group of newly appointed
knights. Serves Marth as a royal guard. Appears
in Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem.

Hails from the Altean village of Sera. Leader
of the 7th Platoon, a group of newly appointed
knights. Serves Marth as a royal guard. Appears
in Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem.

A reformed thief who takes the War of Shadows
as a chance to atone for his crimes. Lives and
works in a convent with Sister Lena. Appears
in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

A cleric revered as Macedon's Angel. Cares for
orphans in her convent after the conclusion of
the War of Shadows. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Mystery of the Emblem.

A bishop in service of Gharnef, and leader of
a group of assassins. Formerly a kind-hearted
caretaker of war orphans. Appears in Fire
Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem.

Queen of Dökkálfheimr, realm of nightmares.
Loves her older brother Freyr dearly, raging
with bitter jealousy at his care for lesser
mortal creatures.

Balanced and powerful against foes
that counterattack. Can also support
allies with Joint Drive Atk.

Spurn drops damage taken and raises
damage dealt by Specials! On top of
her weapon effect, expect high power.

Is effective against cavalry, can nullify
buffs, AND can counter swords, axes,
lances, and beasts at any distance!

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Grants Spd+3. Unit can counterattack
regardless of foe's range. If unit's Spd > foe's
Spd, reduces damage from attacks during
combat and from area-of-effect Specials
(excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by
percentage = difference between stats × 4
(max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 25% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.
